alert.note: Alert for Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 12:00AM CDT until July 24 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: The National Weather Service in La Crosse has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Clayton County in northeastern Iowa... Western Grant County in southwestern Wisconsin... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1200 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Farmersburg to near Edgewood, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Guttenberg around 1230 AM CDT. Cassville and Bloomington around 1235 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Big H Campground, Camp C.S. Klaus, Mederville, Turkey River, Beetown, Bixby State Park and Highway 13 And County C 24. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
